tool_description: Carbon footprints of tech products i.e. mobile devices, smart watches, computers etc.
title: Tech Products Carbon Footprints

api_list.name: getEmissionByProductName
api_list.description:
Input: valid product name.
Output: carbon footprint of requested product. If input is invalid you will receive empty list/array.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tech-products-carbon-footprints.p.rapidapi.com/{product_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tech-products-carbon-footprints.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
